    Class RelativeOffset

    Relative offset of an image to the center of the source. The unit of measure is the width or height of an image. So in case of an an offset of (0.5, 0.5) the symbol will be moved half the width of the image to the right and half the height of the image to the top. So the bottom left point of the image will be on the location.
